title: M+ Heatmaps are now officially released

changelog.description: M+ heatmaps are now live! For more info, see https://raider.io/events/raiderio-great-eight-celebration/day-8

changes.change: When viewing a heatmap, switching floors and then refreshing the heatmap by changing a filter, no longer renders the heatmap for the previous floor on your current floor.
Loading indicator is now moved to the bottom of the screen, along with the display of how many routes the current heatmap is based on.
